title: Multicultural education: a teaching style
creator_credit: Wayne Threm, David Arnold, Dennis Hicks and Media Five Film
brief_description: Looks at the change from the traditional “melting pot” theory to an appreciation of cultural pluralism. Several classroom approaches are demonstrated which encourage ethnic groups to maintain their identity and pride and at the same time learn mutual respect. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
